name: Robox (Magna Media)
overview: When in 3099 after the great enlightenment the 3 suns rose over a small outpost in the beta system, none of the evading residents suspected that this would be a bad day for them. With lightning and thunder, a battleship of the cruel plasma eaters appeared on the horizon and immediately started sucking off the atmosphere and water, which upset even the most peaceful beta dweller, so they put the algae drink away, switched off the dream boxes, and offered great advice. What was to be done? The Jedi Knights had been retired for a long time, Batgirl was a housewife in the Scrooge system, the Green Barets now only dust ... There was only one solution: you had to reactivate HIM. HE was the savior of mankind, the most common of the buzzing tin guild : ROBOX! The very last combat robot of the C-Class ... (Ork help us!) ............. Published in 64'er 1994/09.
